Test Name: Hereditary Thrombocytopenia Gene Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Purpose: To identify genetic variants associated with hereditary thrombocytopenia using next-generation sequencing.
Container: Appropriately labeled sample tube (e.g., EDTA tube) for blood or bone marrow
Equipment: NGS platform (e.g., Illumina MiSeq/NextSeq) with associated DNA extraction, library preparation, and QC instruments
